0: Block ads, paywalls, and other nonsense
File list program that supports multiple storage

#!/bin/sh
set -e

echo "Starting OpenList as user $(id -u):$(id -g)..."

# Set umask if specified
if [ -n "$UMASK" ]; then
  umask "$UMASK"
fi

# Handle version command
if [ "$1" = "version" ]; then
  exec ./openlist version
fi

# Start aria2 if enabled
if [ "$RUN_ARIA2" = "true" ]; then
  echo "Starting aria2c in background..."
  aria2c \
    --enable-rpc \
    --rpc-allow-origin-all \
    --conf-path=/opt/aria2/.aria2/aria2.conf \
    >/dev/null 2>&1 &
fi

# Start OpenList server
echo "Starting OpenList server..."
exec ./openlist server --no-prefix

apk add --no-cache jq curl && \
curl -H "X-Auth-Token: $MINIFLUX_API_KEY" -X GET http://miniflux.default.svc.cluster.local/v1/feeds | jq && \
FEED_IDS=$(curl -H "X-Auth-Token: $MINIFLUX_API_KEY" -X GET http://miniflux.default.svc.cluster.local/v1/feeds | jq -r '.[].id') && \
for feed_id in $FEED_IDS; do \
  echo $feed_id && \
  curl -X PUT -H "X-Auth-Token: $MINIFLUX_API_KEY" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"crawler":true}' "http://miniflux.default.svc.cluster.local/v1/feeds/$feed_id"; \
done

QUERY=$(cat /queries/scan.graphql | tr '\n' ' ' | sed 's/"/\\"/g')
curl -sS -X POST "$STASH_URL" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d "{\"query\": \"$QUERY\"}"

QUERY=$(cat /queries/identify.graphql | tr '\n' ' ' | sed 's/"/\\"/g')
curl -sS -X POST "$STASH_URL" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d "{\"query\": \"$QUERY\"}"

QUERY=$(cat /queries/autotag.graphql | tr '\n' ' ' | sed 's/"/\\"/g')
curl -sS -X POST "$STASH_URL" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d "{\"query\": \"$QUERY\"}"

QUERY=$(cat /queries/autotag.graphql | tr '\n' ' ' | sed 's/"/\\"/g')
curl -sS -X POST "$STASH_URL" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d "{\"query\": \"$QUERY\"}"

QUERY=$(cat /queries/clean-generated.graphql | tr '\n' ' ' | sed 's/"/\\"/g')
curl -sS -X POST "$STASH_URL" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d "{\"query\": \"$QUERY\"}"

QUERY=$(cat /queries/optimise-database.graphql | tr '\n' ' ' | sed 's/"/\\"/g')
curl -sS -X POST "$STASH_URL" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d "{\"query\": \"$QUERY\"}"

/bin/ollama serve &
echo "Waiting for Ollama server to start..."
sleep 10

mkdir -p /.ollama/models
chown -R 1000:1000 /.ollama/models

for model in $OLLAMA_MODELS; do
  if ! /bin/ollama pull "$model"; then
    echo "Failed to pull model: $model"
    exit 1
  fi
done

echo "Listing model directories and files:"
find /.ollama -type f

set -Eeuxo pipefail

uv tool run --from "huggingface-hub[cli]" huggingface-cli login --token $HF_TOKEN
for model in $HF_MODELS; do
  safe_name=$(echo "$model" | sed 's/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/-/g')
  model_path="/models/$safe_name"
  echo "Downloading Hugging Face model $model into $model_path"

  mkdir -p "$model_path"
  chown -R 1000:1000 $model_path

  uv tool run --from "huggingface-hub[cli]" huggingface-cli download $model --local-dir $model_path
done

echo "Model download complete. Listing files:"
find /models -type f
